name: wholepage.css
description: grid layout with fixed aspect ratio

scripts.start: cd docs && ls | grep -v src | xargs rm && cd .. && parcel docs/src/index.html -d docs/
scripts.build: cd docs && ls | grep -v src | xargs rm && cd .. && parcel build docs/src/index.html -d docs/ --no-source-maps --public-url ./ && parcel build src/wholepage.scss --no-source-maps

author: aute
